#summary Under work, a generalized database table for all data

= Introduction =

This document is under work, the plan is to have a generalized database table that fits all sensors.

= Details =

The fields that all sensors have common:

|| DateTime || PacketType || SubType || SeqNbr || Battery || Signal ||
|| DateTime || varchar(2) || varchar(2) || varchar(2) || byte || byte ||

Note, that battery is not used for all sensors, this case it will be ff.

Sensor specific data fields:

|| Sensor || data1 || data2 || data3 ||
|| 0x51 || humidity || humidity status || - ||
